title: Inhouse tracking/afterwork (incl. invoicing) / Inhouse - Nachverfolgung (inkl. Faktura)
acceptance_criteria:
A new button labeled "Track Suborder" is available on the EOS SeCe-IT suborder.
The tracking page can be accessed after the suborder has been successfully completed (i.e., after a successful click on "Send" or "Send for revision").
Before sending, the button is white and clickable — however, clicking it triggers a pop-up:
"Before you can track this suborder, it must be sent."
Non-editing users (read-only access) can also access the page.
The same logic applies: the suborder must be sent before the page is accessible.
The page remains accessible in read-only mode even after the order is closed in EOS.
In read-only view (non-editors), the button always remains white.
Icon: assets/img/icons/new-window_outline.svg
Clicking the button opens a new page titled: "Order Tracking [ATT Order ID – linked]"
Below the title, the partner system, suborder, and location are displayed.
Below that, the customer number and customer name are shown.
In the header, there are buttons: "Close", "Back", and "Next" (logic remains unchanged).
